H0.text: Chemical reactions are the process through which the Sun produces energy.

H1.text: Fission of uranium is the process by which the Sun produces energy.

H2.text: Nuclear fusion is how the Sun produces energy.

H3.text: Volcanic eruptions are how the Sun produces energy.

A4.text: The Sun is heated to incandescence by nuclear fusion reactions in its core.

A5.text: The core is the only region of the Sun that produces an appreciable amount of thermal energy through fusion.
